Fishers.Hamilton Town Center:
Hamilton Town Center is a retail lifestyle center in Noblesville, Indiana. Opened in 2008, it is owned and managed by Simon Property Group.


== History ==
The center opened in 2008 with Dick's Sporting Goods, J. C. Penney, Bed Bath & Beyond, Borders Books & Music, Designer Shoe Warehouse, Ulta, Stein Mart, and Squeeze Play are among its anchor stores.
